name: Rock n' Rush: Battle Racing
description:
Rock n' Rush Battle Racing its a Multiplayer Combat Racing Game inspired by the 90's classics like Rock n 'Roll Racing and Mario Kart.



Miss the 90's great rock n' roll games soundtracks? Not anymore!

Rock Road has an exclusive Rock n' Roll soundtrack inspired by the finest games soundtracks from the 90's



Unleash hell over the racing tracks with powerful weapons!

Use the environment to outsmart your enemies!
Push them at lava pits, in front of moving trains and much more!



Race and battle up to 8 players at once!

Battle your friends or join random races around the world!



Arcade style single race and tournament modes!Key Features
  • Exclusive Soundtrack
  • Combat Racing
  • Online Multiplayer
  • Arcade Style Single Player
